title: viktor changes are awful
body:
**Siphon Power (Q):**
Cooldown lowered to 8/7/6/5/4 from 10/8.5/7/5.5/4
Missile damage increased to 60/85/110/135/160 from 40/60/80/100/120
AP ratio increased to .4 from .2
Attack damage changed to 20/35/50/65/80 from 20-210 (based on level)
Shield changed to [8% max mana + (.15 AP)] from [30/50/70/90/110 + (.20 AP)]
**Death Ray (E):**
Laser Damage AP ratio reduced to .5 from .7
[Augment] Explosion damage changed to 40/70/100/130/160 (+ .6 AP) from 100% of Laser Damage
[Augment] REMOVED No longer reduces explosion damage by 60% against targets damaged by Death Ray.
[Augment] Explosion delay increased to 1.25 seconds from .6 seconds
**Chaos Storm (R):**
Initial damage lowered to 100/175/250 (+.5 AP) from 150/250/350 (+.55 AP)
Tick interval increased to 2 seconds from .5 seconds
Tick damage changed to 150/250/350 (.6 AP) from 15/30/45 (.10 AP)
Duration reduced to 6 seconds from 7

He just became the clunkiest piece of shit ever. All the self-synergy he had with his own kit -- gone. Now he's going to be "stun or die" because his E's burst is more delayed and his R only does something every 2 seconds (why??)

Not to mention you nerfed his E a few patches ago for waveclearing too good. If this update goes through with that 1.25 second delay, waveclearing's all it's going to be good for. 

stop reworking champions that don't need it.

edit: I played him on the PBE. He feels horribly untuitive in almost every way now; E takes too long to hit twice and R doesn't even exist in between its shock intervals. Riot, buffing his numbers to the point he'll obliterate you entirely on if you get locked down inside his stun isn't healthy. It turned possibly your healthiest mage into a toxic kit; revert these and leave him alone.

It's a shame that Riot want's him as a battle mage, Viktor potential and flexibility has always resided on being able to swap between Burst mage and Artillery mage (And even Battle mage). > W has to be more reliable in order to have a shot at catching people for E and R: No changes at all

Hell no. It's a good enough as a defensive tool, we don't need viktor to actually use it ON you and then kill you?!

But that's the point -. I'm fine with it only being a defensive tool in his current kit. But this new kit basically removes *any* ability to go on offense without a teammate. That's not fun or fair. There needs to be some sort of hope to land e proc without a teammate and that can really only come from W. I'm not saying it needs to even be 50/50 level of reliable but right now anyone can just walk out of it without doing anything. 

Current W is meant to be a defensive tool while E is meant to be an offensive tool and Q is a balance of the two. That's balanced.

I'd argue he isnt even a battle mage, his dmg isnt quite as sustained enough outside ult, and he is far less durable.  Rather, he is being turned into a disruptor like anivia.  The biggest issue about this is aniva works this way cause she can set up her zones of dmg through a wall and stun, where as viktor cant reliably set up his own E and ult due to lack of any cc or anything.  The ult change is kinda cool honestly, but the E change is specifically destroying him outside of waveclear, although I guess both him and anivia can have funs sharing the spot as gods of waveclear and that can be part of their thing.

His R is a huge buff though. 

For the first 2 seconds if you hit with initial damage it goes from 530(+0.95 AP) to 600(+1.1 AP) at max rank. Over the full duration it now does 1300 (+2.3 AP) damage versus 980 (+1.95 AP), even with the duration nerf. Each new tick does as much damage as live initial burst! It looks like they are trying to make it feel more impactful throughout the ult rather than huge upfront burst that just tickles champions afterwards unless they stay in entire time.

Vik has been my favourite champion ever since Season 2. Once he saw play in the LCS, I started to feel really worried that Riot would nerf the hell out of my favourite champ, but it looked like he got through relatively healthy/viable and still fun.

Then this change happened. 

I can't believe how quickly I went from being really excited about the Mage update to absolutely detesting it.

Not gonna lie, I'm really afraid of how these changes will turn out....
{{summoner:31}}

I feel like a lot of their changes these days are too far in the direction of "overpowered in some scenarios, useless in others."    Windows of power don't always have to be IMMENSELY powerful, and champions should be reasonably strong even at their lows.   They've done a lot of this lately with juggernauts, kog'maw, vel'koz.  Really pushing BIG moments, but...  I'm not sure they always need to be that big.

He'll only be  able to land the first part consistently unless someone is already rooted/stunned. The new E is an ABSOLUTELY MASSIVE loss of damage compared to the current E which will consistently land both procs. You never stun anyone with his gravity field anyway outside of a chaotic teamfight, people can casually walk out of it even if they don't have mobility spells. 

I dislike the ult changes but I could live with them. PLEASE riot revert the deathray changes. It's his most iconic part of the kit, and they are gutting it.

>stop reworking champions that don't need it.

This, please.

I've been playing VIktor since S2. There are lots of things I like about his kit. One of the major things I like about his kit is burst. I like burst champs. Viktor has *always* (pre and post rework) been a heavy burst champ.

Why change this? He's low range, squishy as hell, and lacks mobility. But if he gets close enough to drop his combo, it's fast and devastating. That's a balanced trade-off, in my mind. It's also extremely fun to play around that trade-off.

They're massively slowing down his damage and making him rely heavily on CC to get his combo off, it seems. That sounds fine, but that's not Viktor. Viktor is a burst champ. Why fix what isn't broken?
He's a Battle Mage, so they're reducing his burst and giving him more power for staying alive longer. Makes sense to me. He may deal less damage but he's going to be much tankier with the new RoA.

Actually, I can see where Riot is going with this. Considering that Viktor was picked a lot in exports because of his wave clear that's what they are decided to focus on. A specialised wave clear mage. Since minions will be the only thing he'll be able to kill with delays that horrendous.

But since Viktor is Viktor and not Lee Sin we can't even hope for changes to get pulled back no matter how horrible they are.

I remember when people used to say this before his first rework (when he was allowed to get all three Augments for his Hex Core).  I'd pick Viktor in champion select, and would get crap from at least a few 'teammates'.  They'd change their minds by the end of the game, but it was still annoying to have to defend a champion that I knew was just as strong as any of the FotM stuff at the time.  

Now, though?  I don't think even I can deny the 'troll pick' status now, and that kills me.  Viktor was the first champion I 'mained' when I started playing this game back at the beginning of Season 3.  I remember Solcrushed's "True Evolution" thread, and all the interesting ideas proposed in it over the course of about two years.  

I just don't understand Riot's "balancing" changes in Season 6.  Across the board they don't make sense, and the nerfs to Viktor when he first got picked up in pro play are one of the many signs of that.  He got nerfed for having good wave clear, which was always part of what defined him.  He used to be labelled as a 'Pusher' (before the new classification system) and was picked for his sieging and holding capabilities.  Now, it seems like that's all he'll be good for.  Minions that don't move are the only thing you'll get your second E proc on.  There's no way any player will stand in the same spot for enough time for the second tick to hit them (unless they're just really bad at the game) especially considering how much mobility is in the game now.  

I still love Viktor's lore and his overall personality/character, and he's my favourite champion in the game for those reasons, but if these changes go through I can't realistically see myself picking him in games I want to win.  

Edited for clarity.
